personal.title: Software Engineer, Full Stack Web Developer
personal.tagline: I design tailor-made digital solutions that solve your challenges and bring your most ambitious projects to life.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer passionate about building high-performance and innovative web applications

introduction: With several years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating modern and performant web applications. My passion for clean code and development best practices drives me to constantly improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies.
As a Full Stack Developer, I have a deep understanding of the entire technology stack, from backend to frontend, enabling me to design comprehensive and coherent solutions that meet client needs.

items.title: Full Stack Web Development
items.description: Design and development of complete web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and SQL/NoSQL databases.

items.title: WordPress Development
items.description: Creation of custom WordPress websites, development of tailored themes and plugins, performance and security optimization.

items.title: Clean and Maintainable Architecture
items.description: Application of SOLID principles and layered architecture

items.title: Automated Testing and TDD
items.description: Complete test coverage and test-driven development

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.description: Frontend and backend optimization techniques for fast applications

items.title: Application Security
items.description: Implementation of OWASP security best practices

items.title: Code Review and Collaboration
items.description: Active participation in code reviews and mentoring

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's talk about your project
contact.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to discuss it with you and see how I can help bring it to life.

form.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

gdpr.label: I agree to the processing of my data
gdpr.description: By submitting this form, I agree that my personal data will be used to contact me back. No commercial use will be made of this data.
